## User Story
As a **[type of user]**  
I want **[some goal]**  
So that **[some reason/value]**

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Given …
- [ ] When …
- [ ] Then …

## Tasks
- [ ] Task 1
- [ ] Task 2
